definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Czech licensing brace for Quality Gold Award.

sentences.english: In 1990, the Hong Kong Chinese culture and the gold medal.

sentences.english: The new product took the first prize in the show.
sentences.chinese: 這種新產品在展覽會上獲得了金獎。

sentences.english: The moisturizer we deal in was awarded a gold medal at an international exposition.

sentences.english: 2000 was the seventh group of children pushing new Vocal Competition gold medal.

sentences.english: After Zhang Jiahuan gained a series of national golden and silver medal awards.
sentences.chinese: 張佳歡在取得了一系列國家級金獎銀獎之後。

sentences.english: The winery is located in Bordeaux and was awarded with Golden Price in the Paris Competition 2008.

sentences.english: The Chaozhou Drum Performance was awarded the Gold Prize in the World Youth Union Party.

sentences.english: It gained 3X platina status in the US charts immediately!

definition: special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to be chosen/to be elected as
to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
